creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:

There were occasional problems like this around the milestone 5 release.
Could you please try it again with Tomcat 4.0-beta-1?
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text: No response to request for testing with 4.0b1, so I'm going to close this one.
